answers.answer: Hi,Burning pain on the back of head can occur due to peripheral neuropathy caused by diabetes, B 12 deficiency, thyroid dysfunction. Other causes include neuralgias, nerve compression in the upper part of the cervical spine.Scalp conditions like contact dermatitis due to allergy to hair products can also cause burning pain in the head.I would suggest you to get a preliminary evaluation done by your GP.

question: I have sometimes a burning pain in the back of my head on the right side.  What can cause this?
title: burning pain in right side of back of head
